# Station Pylon Asset
Place pylons to display line information for subway stations, train stations, and even depots! This mod helps pedestrians easily find their way by showing which lines are available at each location.
## How to Use 1. Go to the **Transport** tab in the build menu. 2. Select **Subway**. 3. Pick and place the **Station Pylon** wherever you want to display line information. 4. Click on the placed pylon to open its info panel. 5. Click on Select Building Picker and then select the station you want the pylon to display data for.
## Customization You can modify some visual elements, such as the wheelchair accessibility icon and others, to better fit your station's needs and style. ### Advanced Customization
You can further customize the appearance of the pylons by changing the **line operator icons** and the **icon shape (square or circle)**. To do this, open the **Station Entrance Visuals** mod settings in the game's options menu. There, you can select different icon layouts and operator styles to better match your station's theme or your personal preferences.
## Requirements - **Write Everywhere** - **Station Entrance Visuals** - **Extra Detailing Tools** - **Anarchy**
> **Special thanks to [Klyte45](https://github.com/klyte45) for the custom mesh feature in Write Everywhere, which made this mod possible!**
